data.text: Gei Job ga helekai,
“Hagalongo gi agu helekai,
Dugua mai dogu madagoaa e helekai iei au, ga nomuli,
“I dogu hai ogu donu, hagalee bolo e hai ang gi nia daangada dangada.
Mmada mai gi di au. E dee dohu di godou daumada au
I dogu haga mamaanadu be di maa di aha dela ne hai mai gi di au,
“Ma e aha dela God e dumaalia ang gi digau huaidu gi mouli,
Digaula guu hai nadau dama, nadau dama gu hagadili labelaa nadau dama,
Gei God digi dugu anga di haingadaa gi nadau hale,
Gei nadau kau e hagadili, hagalee mmademmade nadau dama.
Gei nadau dama e lellele e hai nadau dadaagala tenetene
e gaalege gi nia lee ‘harp’ mo nia lee o nia mee ala e iliili.
Digaula e mouli i di aumaalia, gaa mmade ge hagalee nadau mmae ai.
“Digau huaidu e hai ang gi God gi hudee haga deaadee ina ginaadou.
Digaula e haga mamaanadu bolo ginaadou hagalee e hai hegau
Digaula e haga mamaanadu bolo ginaadou e gila humalia hua mai i nadau mahi,
“Di maalama o digau huaidu le e mee di diinai?
gaa ili digaula gadoo be nia geinga maangoo ne ili go di madangi,
“Goodou e haga maanadu bolo God le e hagaduadua di tama
Digau huaidu gii bida hai mee gi nadau hagaduadua.
Di mouli o tangada ma ga hagaodi, le e hai behee, ia e haga mamaanadu
Ma iai tangada e mee di aago a God,
“Hunu daangada e mouli maaloo hua gaa dae loo gi di laangi o nadau mmade.
Hunu daangada e hagalee manawa lamalia.
Huogodoo e hai be di mee e dahi,
“Au e iloo godou hagamamaanadu huaidu e hai baahi mai gi di au.
Goodou e heheeu boloo, ‘Dehee di hale o tangada aamua deenei,
Goodou gu helekai ang gi digau ala e heehee?
I di laangi dela e hagaduadua nia daangada go God gi dono hagawelewele,
Deai tangada e hagi aga tangada huaidu ai,
I di madagoaa dela e lahi iei mee gi di gowaa dela e danu ai digau mmade,
di llongo dangada dogologo e dagi e hula gi taalunga,
“Gei goodou! Goodou e hagamada au
